general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid irrigation and spraying operations during the period of expected rainfall. Make provisions to support crops during high wind speed conditions.

advisory: Nursery sowing should be completed by end of 2nd fortnight of July.
Main field land preparation includes puddling the field twice at 7-10 days intervals and land leveling.
Apply recommended fertilizers at the time of last puddling.
Transplanting should be done at the recommended spacing with specific seedling numbers.
Ideal sowing time is June 20 to end of July for kharif maize.
Use raised bed planting in fields with water stagnation.
Implement weed control measures at critical periods after sowing.
Delay spraying and intercultural operations based on upcoming rainfall forecast.
Start raised bed nursery preparation for kharif vegetable crops.
Avoid planting and intercultural operations during the expected rainfall period.
Ensure deworming and vaccination of animals.
Protect animals from infectious diseases spread during the rainy season.
Provide clean drinking water and safe shelter for animals.
